channel.title: Pages on Robert Vojta (𝒵𝓇𝓏𝓀𝒶)
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Robert Vojta (𝒵𝓇𝓏𝓀𝒶)

item.title: About
item.description: Developer. I don’t write too much - a) it was already said elsewhere, b) I have nothing to say, c) it takes too much time to write something meaningful (like this post for example). It doesn’t mean that I don’t write at all, just the frequency is low. You’d like to ask anything? You can find me here: zrzka @ Stack Overflow zrzka @ GitHub robertvojta @ Twitter Foo.

item.title: Site
item.description: Hugo based blog. Source code of this blog is hosted at GitHub. Content Content of this blog (posts, images, …) is licensed under the Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International. Everything here is from my personal perspective. Not that of my employer or anyone else. FAQ Where’s the old blog Trashed. Yes. I just kept couple of most interesting articles (like VPC & AWS lambda performance) and rest was deleted. Why? It was old, outdated and who wants to read my rants about Swift 2 for example?
